name: Super Mario Odyssey: Balloon World
description:
A free update for Super Mario Odyssey available since February 2018. The update comes with new filters for photo mode, three new outfits, and a mini-game that's composed of two parts: Hide It and Find It.
The new mini-game, Balloon World, is run by Mario's brother Luigi. In Hide It, players have 30 seconds to hide balloons in select worlds. In Find It, players are given 30 seconds to find balloons hidden by other players. There's a leaderboard for Balloon World too. Balloon world is only available after beating the main story.

- Added Luigi's Balloon World
- More Filters Added
- More Outfits Added
- Jump-Rope Challenge has been adjusted so that there will be a speed change after -reaching 110 jumps.
- World Rankings and Friend Rankings have been reset for Jump-Rope Challenge.
- Fixed a number of issues to improve the gameplay experience.

name: Escape String
description:
Escape String, is a 2D puzzle game set in an undefined time and place. A small humanoid robot wakes up in the debris of a landfill inside a large factory.
He receives strange and enigmatic messages, from someone who apparently wants to help him. The robot's purpose is to explore the large factory where he is in search of answers about who he and his mysterious remote helper are.
The player does not control the robot directly and in real time, but inserts movement commands above its display in order to tell the robot when it is time to jump, to crouch and more.
It is therefore a puzzle game based on perspective: the player must calculate the spaces between the robot and the obstacles. The obstacles are initially totally static, but as they advance, they will be more and more dynamic and varied.
For example, we will have guard robots that will perform the same actions as our robot in a mirrored manner. There are currently 40 levels, with 8 types of obstacles.
The real challenge will consist in finishing the level with the minimum possible number of indications (input) and providing these commands in a single line (string), ending the level while simultaneously satisfying these conditions will unlock the ""gold chip"" of that particular level.
The ""gold chip"" will be used to unlock new skins for our robot. This title is therefore suitable both for those looking for a relaxing puzzle, given the non-dynamic gameplay, and for those looking for a challenge given its arcade nature.

name: La Prision
description:
La Prision (The Prison) is a massively multiplayer role-playing game online (MMORPG), set in a prison as a persistent game world, to be played exclusively through the Internet.

Players take the role of a prisoner in a special jail, living under the rules of the game, interacting with other players (for better or worse) and venturing into the intricacies of the world and its characters.

The player's character in the game is a prisoner sentenced to life imprisonment. To introduce a new player in the game world, he must create a character, give him a ASPECT (sex, constitution, hairstyle, clothing ...), select a crime for which he has been imprisoned and some defining features.

To improve the character and increase the level he need to get experience. This is obtained from fights, but also helping many of the Bots doing several missions. He can fight in groups to share the experience of a difficult fight, although a senior level, players are often organized in clans to communicate better and help, establish a uniform etc.

The character has a set of skills depending on the chosen crime. Some of them require that the character and his training have reached a certain level of experience. He can also try to steal items from action bots. When caught, a fight can be started, but also at any given moment with another character.

As in other games, there are several trade skills, here for instance by going to the kitchen and combining objects in the oven, or finding books in libraries to learn recipes, concepts of mechanics, the art of chemical or sewing. The game has an advanced and configurable chat system to improve the communications between players.

The point of view in the game is third-person. The character can also be seen from different fixed cameras, depending of the room where he is in. When in combat, the player enters a special "combat mode" where he can control the cameras of the scene. Up to 32 players can be immersed in a battle between prisoners or bots.

description: CyberTitans is a multiplayer strategy game with crazy mechanics where you lead your Titans against the world. Recruit your Titans, position them on the field and send them into the battleground. Choose the smartest way to manage your economy during the game, merge Titans, level up your Totem or roll the cybershop to summon up to 44 unique characters.

name: Overwatch 2: Watchpoint Pack
description:
The pack includes the following Overwatch 2 in-game content: Season One Premium Battle Pass, 7 Legendary skins (including 2 all-new Space Raider skins), 5 Epic skins, 2,000 Overwatch Coins and instant access to all 35 Overwatch Heroes.

With the Season One Premium Battle Pass you can unlock over 80 Tiers of rewards including Mythic Cyber Demon Genji, Legendary Hinotori Kiriko, and more. In addition, as a Season One Premium Battle Pass owner you will automatically receive access to Overwatch’s latest hero, Kiriko!

name: Wojak This Game
description: Simple rules apply! Be a Wojak and stay away from any traps! It won't be that simple, though. Will you be able to get beyond the irksome challenges and terrains that keep appearing in your path?

name: No Man's Sky: Expeditions
description: Update 3.3, Expeditions, introduces a brand new way to play No Man’s Sky. Start a fresh journey in a brand new game mode, master a unique set of challenges with revitalised mission mechanics, earn exclusive new rewards, visit bustling hub worlds, and much more!

name: No Man's Sky: Companions
description: Adopt an alien creature and explore the universe side-by-side in the Companions update! Take care of your new friend as they find hidden resources and protect you from hostile aliens, or genetically modify their eggs and breed unique, never-before-seen creations!

name: No Man's Sky: Next Generation
description:
Update 3.10 brings a graphically enhanced and smoother No Man’s Sky to the next generation of consoles. All enhancements are available to PC players.

Continue your journey in a universe with bigger bases, lusher planets, more players, faster warp speeds and more – free for all existing players.

name: No Man's Sky: Origins
description:
Update 3.0, Origins, dramatically expands the universe of No Man’s Sky. Explore a stranger, richer and more varied universe, with deeper planetary diversity, dramatic new terrain, a host of new creatures, new weather conditions, colossal buildings, and much more.

Our journey continues.

name: SpiritSurge
description: SpiritSurge is a turn-based, classic RPG set in the odd-yet-fantastical world of Launell. You fill the shoes of Nathaniel Andrews, a citizen of the chaotic country Conterra. He and his peers find themselves unwillingly wrapped up in the machinations of the many corporeal and spiritual powers that be, engaging in combat when needed

name: WonderWorld
description: WONDERWORLD is an adventure-RPG game inspired by UNDERTALE

name: Forgiven
description:
FORGIVEN is an upcoming RPG game detailing the adventures of four kids
and the powers that arise with spiritual unity and focus

name: Kao the Kangaroo: Oh! Well
description: With 5 new playable Eternal Wells to conquer and 5 scary skins to unlock, Kao The Kangaroo’s Oh! Well DLC pack is the perfect way to get ready for a scare.

name: Play Rough
description: Play Rough is a roleplaying game set in the surreal, post-apocalyptic wasteland of what was once California. It's a place where humans live side-by-side with living cartoons, twisted abominations of ink and flesh, and... Clowns...?

name: Astra Hunter Zosma
description: Astra Hunter Zosma aims to be a short treasure-hunting RPG with a focus on combat, exploration, and a blossoming friendship between a buddy duo!

name: Champion Strike: Hero Clash
description: Champion Strike: Hero Clash is a 1v1 real-time PvP strategy simulation game with a controllable Champion aspect. Strategize your battle with the simple Champion control until the battle is over! The unpredictable battle that's going to take place through the Arena with controllable Champions will make players around the world very excited!

name: Ninja Gaiden
description: Port of Ninja Gaiden for DOS.

name: Attack Retrieve Capture
description: Attack Retrieve Capture was a free multiplayer, 2D computer game created by John Vechey and Brian Fiete, who would go on to co-found PopCap Games, as a college project and was later published by Hoopy Entertainment in 1995. The game was primarily capture the flag, but other game modes existed.

name: Judero
description: A handmade action/adventure game based on the rich folklore of the Scottish Borders. You play as Judero, a Celt who can establish a rapport with the nature around him. Travel with Judero through a handcrafted landscape as he discovers there is an evil at work manipulating the unguarded.

name: Under the Black Moon
description:
Can you believe your luck? Travelling in a transport plane you get shot down! You survive and things only get worse.

Work your way through the area into the base and do whatever you have to do to get picked up. Take you time as the enemy has had plenty of time to prepare for your arrival (not that they were expecting you)

name: Sweet Half-Life
description:
Sweet Half-Life is a single player science fiction and Manga-based Mod of Valve's first-person shooter Half-Life, set at a similar time to the original game and following a similar storyline. It is played through the eyes of Gordon McGinley, and follows his plight to escape from the crumbling Black Mesa Research Facility.

It includes 3 new weapons and 5 new enemies.

name: Focalpoint
description:
A few hours after Adrian Shephard and his squad got scattered allover the Black Mesa Complex, headquarter sent a rescue team to search the lost crew.

Finding himself in the misery a soldier tries to do the best out of his lonely situation. Searching for allies he quickly becomes a major part in an issue he's never been training for.

name: Heart of Evil: Napalm Edition
description: Heart of Evil: Napalm Edition (HOE NE) is a remake of the original Heart of Evil.

name: Deliverance
description:
After defeating the alien leader Nihilanth, you, Gordon Freeman, declined the mysterious G-Man’s offer of employment and narrowly escaped death at the hands of several alien grunts.

After battling your way through the Lambda Reactor Complex and realigning the antenna dish you were able to make contact with the outside world.

Word has spread of the strange events at Black Mesa and the government is attempting to coverup the truth by reporting “a terrorist plot to obtain U.S. military secrets has been uncovered at the Black Mesa Complex. An undetermined number of civilian personnel have been killed in the well-organised terrorist raid which has been met by U.S. rapid-deployment forces.”

name: Returnal: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Returnal is a 2021 roguelike third-person shooter video game developed by Housemarque and published by Sony Interactive Entertainment.

It follows Selene Vassos, an astronaut who lands on the planet Atropos in search of the mysterious "White Shadow" signal and finds herself trapped in a time loop.

After crash-landing on a shape-shifting alien planet, Selene finds herself fighting tooth and nail for survival. Every time she’s defeated, the player is forced to restart the journey.

The Digital Deluxe Edition includes:
- Main game
- Electropylon Driver weapon
- Hollowseeker weapon
- One Reflex Stimulant
- One Adrenaline Booster
- One Pulsating Mass artefact
- PSN avatars for PS5
- Digital soundtrack

name: Smart Decoy
description: You are sent to an underwater base. Your objective is to reach and destroy the “machine”.

name: Radix
description:
You find yourself on a spaceship, which seems to be researching Xen lifeforms. Follow the clues to a spot on the ship and then ignore the sign.

At this point things turn fun! Are you fast and smart enough to escape? Only time will tell….

name: The Xeno Project
description:
The terraformation of Xen has begun. The planet now supports a breathable oxygen-nitrogen atmosphere and earth-like gravity. A scientific facility called the Xeno Project has been set up on the planet for continuing research into portal technology. Tension on the planet is running high due to the secrecy surrounding the project and the military’s distrust of the scientific community.

You are Gordon Freeman. Your mission is to report to the underground test lab at the Xeno Project.

name: Pokémon Crystal Ultimate
description: The goal of this romhack is to be the ultimate Pokémon Crystal experience for fans, a remaster of sorts: same story (with a few new scenes and dialogue), same Pokémon, same world (with some restored and improved areas), but the game is more playable, balanced and challenging. There’s extra content added too as well as many QoL improvements from music to sprite work to brand new features and battle system improvements!

name: ETC: Earthquake Test Centre
description: All that matters is that you find yourself in a BM-style base with aliens and army trying to kill you. It’s clear that you need to find a way out. In fact, there’s a working portal, if only you could reach it!

name: ETC: Earthquake Test Centre 2
description:
ETC finished with Freeman heading into the teleporter. Where it took him was not revealed. So, where did Freeman go?

The military weren’t there just to clean out the creatures. They weren’t there to remove Freeman. They weren’t there to silence the innocents.

The military were there in need of information. ‘Xen’ was news to them. They had to know more. The teleportation unit they uncovered was merely an accessory allowing them to gain access to the facility. And Gordon went the wrong way. But Gordon was not prepared for this. You couldn’t be.

name: Nuclear Winter
description: Nuclear Winter is a single player mission for Half-Life Opposing Force. It comprises 29 new maps plus a ton of new scripted scenes, models, artwork, character voices, sound effects and music.

name: Crescent Prism
description: Crescent Prism is a story-driven RPG that follows the story of Lunita, a young girl from the bustling hamlet of Merryday Village.

name: Scientist Slaughterhouse
description: Gordon Freeman is an agent of an advanced weapons corporation called Death & Destruction Inc. (DDI). DDI on the other hand takes orders from an alien military force known as the Nephilim Alliance (NA), originating from an alternate dimension. The problem is loads of scientists are appearing out of nowhere and they need someone to get rid of them...

name: Crack Life
description: Crack Life was made from total boredom. It features a bunch of overused jokes and memes that only get more annoying every time you hear them.

name: Astromeda
description: Astromeda is an adventure RPG, featuring unique fast-paced and turn-based battles in a mysterious, charming world. You are a human who returns to an Earth inhabited by intelligent Bacteria. Explore a rich world, befriend or fight quirky characters, and uncover the mysteries of the Bacteria race. The game is inspired by Undertale, H

name: Cthulhu: An Unspeakable Mod
description: You play Ranulf Stafford, an occult investigator in Arkham in the year 1928. Drawn into a nightmare chain of events, you find yourself the only thing standing between mankind and the return of Cthulhu, one of the most dreadful of The Great Old Ones.

name: Jamie's Mod
description: After Black Mesa plummeted into the ground 200 years after the incident, it was brought back to life by a group of Blue-Headed men all named "Jamie". Jamie and all his friends now work at the lab, and ironically enough the same exact thing that happened 200 years ago happens again. Even with Gordon Freeman brought back from the dead.

name: Xenosaga Episode I: Der Wille zur Macht - Reloaded
description: "Xenosaga Episode I Reloaded" is a re-release of Xenosaga Episode 1 exclusively in Japan. This version, including the English voice work, additional costumes and bonus features, was released on November 20, 2003.

name: Disney Princess: Magical Adventures
description: Disney Princess: Magical Adventures is a plug-n-play TV game which is the sequel to the original Disney Princess TV game containing five games released by Jakks Pacific and developed by Handheld Games, LLC. in 2006.

name: Dora the Explorer
description:
Dora The Explorer: Race To Play Park is a Plug It In & Play TV Game released by Jakks Pacific in 2005.

The controller consists of a board game named Play Park Race, where before each game you play a memory game called Memory Match.

name: Dora the Explorer: Nursery Rhyme Adventure
description:
Dora The Explorer: Nursery Rhyme Adventure is a Plug It In & Play TV Game released by Jakks Pacific in 2005.

Other game names are indicated on the packaging: Dora's Nursery Rhyme Adventure and Dora the Explorer 2.

There is a story mode, as well as the ability to run mini-games.

name: DreamWorks Dragons
description: DreamWorks Dragons, based on the How to Train Your Dragon franchise is a Plug & Play Hero Portal game developed by HotGen and published by Jakks Pacific in 2014. Similar to Skylanders, you place a figure on the Hero Portal base to play the game.

name: Duck Commander: Hunting Video Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Disney Princess: Cinderella - Once Upon a Midnight
description: Disney Princess: Cinderella - Once Upon a Midnight is a Plug It In & Play TV Game based on the movie developed by Handheld Games LLC and published by Jakks Pacific in 2007.

name: Retro Abyss
description:
You Have Loved Games Since You Were Little.
But You Have Grown Up Without Defeating The Final Boss.
The Final Boss Remains In Your Heart And Leads You Into The Retro Abyss...

name: HexLand: Rise of Blue
description:
HexLand: Rise of Blue is a real-time strategy game (RTS)
You play as Blue Blood leader. Some part of continent claimed by many clans. You must lead your man to conquer all lands.

name: Quantum Tripper: Voyager
description: Mutually exclusive and ultimately distinct domains of reality, the material and the spiritual.

name: Quantum Tripper: Wetwash
description: The creative genius has learnt to reckon with the modern world in an all-embracing vision.

name: Pantazil
description: The Pantazil is a 2D exploration and platform game with a pixel art style.

name: Category 1: Shisenjou no Survivor
description: Sin descripción

name: Incubus: A ghost-hunters tale
description: You are on your first solo ghost hunt, under the watchful instructions of Bear and Jen from the O.P.G paranormal team. Use real gadgets in a real location, a house investigated by the developers on the request of three different owners. It is a case worthy of a video game, so welcome to Incubus.

name: Chased
description: Chased is a single-player horror game. You will have to try to find the exit and proceed to the next upcoming levels. But remember you are not alone. On every single level, there are going to be different entities that will not let you escape by trying to trap and catch you.

name: Chewing Gum Tests
description: Chewing Gum Tests - A side-view physics-based puzzle platformer where you have to control chewing gum by pointing and throwing it with your mouse.

name: Hannah Montana: Pop Tour
description: Hannah Montana: Pop Tour is a deluxe TV games by Jakks Pacific released in 2008 as part of their g2 lineup. The game is a lot like Guitar Hero, Hannah Montana Style. You tour cities & play songs to unlock other cities & songs.

name: Bomber Command
description: Take command of what would become the greatest air armada in history! Build, plan, coordinate, and command your forces into a mighty aerial armada against a smart German economy that adapts to your attacks, researches tech, and smartly reacts to your moves. Take over the Bomber Command.

name: Minion Masters: Torment
description:
The Torment DLC is a great +300% value bundle to unleash fire and fury on your enemies! including the legendary Crakgul Doomcleaver! It also gives you a headstart in this month’s Season Pass.

Includes:
- Magma Court Arena
- Volco (Master)
- Demolisher Volco Master Skin
- 3x Crakgul Doomcleaver (Legendary card)
- 5x Incubus (Supreme card)
- 20x Assassin
- 40x Magma Storm
- 5x Power Tokens (Get 5 extra random surprises)
- 3x Season Pass Tiers

Embrace your demon within with Volco, who enrages your melee Minions. Crakgul Doomcleaver strong attacks makes your Voidborne cards cheaper to play with each fresh kill, which lets you overrun your opponent with demonic horrors such as the Assassin and Incubus! The pack also includes the fiery Magma Court (custom arena) which is the perfect setting to unleash doom on your opponents!
With this DLC, you have the perfect kit to start your reign as a demonic overlord!

name: The Jumping Burger: Halloween Edition
description: Join BIG B on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: My Life: Riding Stables 3
description: Put your heart and soul into looking after the well-being of your beloved four-legged friends on a beautiful stud farm, which you can expand over the course of the game. Climb into the saddle and enjoy challenging training sessions, fantastic tournaments…

name: World Soccer Cup 2022
description: Play the world national teams soccer cup while it is played by your favourite national team. With its fast action and intense gameplay, this soccer game will provide you long hours of fun especially if you are a soccer fan.

name: Forklift Extreme: Vertigo Farm
description: Play 10 brand new levels and get special operator skin. Unique environment and challenges awaits!

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Character Pack - Toyosatomimi no Miko
description: The fifth pack of additional characters is already here! Introducing "Toyosatomimi no Miko" Shoutoku Taoist! Has the ability to send out "Star Bubble" that increases spell charge!

name: SnowRunner: Rezvani Hercules
description: Expand your SnowRunner garage further with the Rezvani Hercules, a high-performance 6-wheel Scout truck with a fierce and unique modern look.

name: Kao the Kangaroo: A Well Good Bundle
description: The Well Good Bundle includes the Kao The Kangaroo (2022) full game, all of the free DLC released so far (two costume packs) and the Oh Well! DLC pack for one price!

name: Runefall 2: Collector's Edition
description:
Embark on an epic match-3 journey with your old friends from Rivermoor. The people didn’t have long to celebrate their previous victory after finding all the long-lost runes.

The Collector's Edition includes 25 extra levels, additional achievements, a strategy guide, the making of Runefall 2, a full game soundtrack, and desktop wallpapers.

name: Ultra Kaiju Monster Rancher: Starter Pack
description:
Includes:
- Kaiju: Sevenger Giant of Light Skin
- Kaiju: Science Party Mocchi
- Raising Item Set 1
- Raising Item Set 2

name: Minigolf Adventure: Cherry Blossom Valley
description: Get ready to be enchanted by the magic of Minigolf Adventure’s brand-new world: Cherry Blossom Valley. This addon pack contains a handcrafted oriental series of levels full of beauty and tranquility.

name: Japanese Escape Games: The Forbidden Garden
description: The 10th Japanese Escape Games series!! Game system This game is an escape-the-room game (mystery-adventure game). *Point the screen with a cursor to solve riddles, and this game goes on. Story There is a place every adventurer talks about.

name: Pure-hearted Gyaru and the Shape of Happiness
description: Pure-hearted Gyaru and the Shape of Happiness is a novel game in which the protagonist, is troubled by the gap between the past and the present of a childhood friend whom he has reunited after several years. Seeking an answer to their relationship.

name: Fishing Ducks
description: Let's go fishing for rubber ducks! A fun game that will transport you to the nostalgic fairground stalls, where you have to catch all the rubber ducks, using the fishing rods. Play alone or challenge your friends to see who can get the highest score. Per…

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Harbinger Edition
description: Prophecies rise out of thin air from the eternal, channeled through the mind of Harbingers and distilled in chants or tomes - like the Grimoire of Volgïr. Those end up being passed down generations until they finally find their purpose.

name: Poke the Stray Cat
description:
Poke The Stray Cat Puzzle Game !

Our cat is in good spirits!

We need to spoil this fun

Disturb the cat by drawing the correct object

Enjoy this amazing puzzle game with 120 levels!

name: The Forest Adventurer
description:
The Forest Adventurer Game !

Fight against jungle creatures and survive!

Jump or slide to avoid the creatures in front of you!

Don't forget to use your axes when you have to, but be careful, they are not unlimited!

Can you pass all the chapters?

name: Jungle Adventures 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Pixel Kid
description: Super Pixel Kid is 2D platform adventure game. There are 5 adventure worlds in the game, a total of 100 levels, each adventure world ends with a final boss. Control pixel kid to run, jump blocks and explore the arcades. Travel across dangerous jungle, cave, etc. Collect coins, gold, acceleration props to help you defeat the Monster! Have fun!

name: Klotski+
description: Sin descripción

name: Formula Drag Manager
description:
Formula Drag Manager Game !

If you like drag races, you will love playing with Formula-1 vehicles!

This Game is for you.

Choose your car, win drag races!

Power up your car and challenge the best!

Save your money and buy more powerful cars!

name: Euro Truck Life & Logistics Simulators
description: Logistics on dangerous roads. Carry loads. Try not to fall off the cliff. Reach the finish location as soon as possible. Cross the road carefully. You have to reach the last place and park before falling down. It is a fun and difficult game.

name: Super Sans Race Running
description: Sin descripción

name: Sifunight Fighters
description: It is a very enjoyable street fighting game. Fight the enemies on the way. Kick and punch. You can jump and hit. Beat all the men. Skip all chapters. It is a very enjoyable fighting game.

name: Ambulance Race
description: Travel on the roads with the ambulance vehicle. Smash small vehicles. Dodge the big vehicles. Get the highest score before you run out of energy. Skip all chapters. It is a very enjoyable ambulance game.

name: Hungry Shark Arena: Horror Night
description: Sin descripción

name: Metal Army War Revenge
description: Sin descripción

name: Escape the Room Inscryption Door
description: The newest escape room game. Decrypt passwords, find secret keys. Unlock locked doors. Try to pass all levels. Escape the rooms. It is a fun and research game.

name: Tales of Symphonia
description: The Playstation 2 version of Tales of Symphonia adds extra content such as new animated cutscenes, story events, and costumes.

name: Tales of Symphonia
description:
An HD remaster of the Playstation 2 version of Tales of Symphonia that comes with extra content. It is also bundled in the Tales of Symphonia Chronicles collection for the Playstation 3.

Over 80 hours of gameplay in this epic, emotionally charged storyline. Experience the fierce, action-packed battle system. Combine hundreds of special attacks and magic spells.

In a dying world, legend has it that a Chosen One will one day rise from amongst the people and the land will be reborn. The line between good and evil blurs in this epic adventure where the fate of two interlocked worlds hangs in the balance.

name: Vanilla: Made to Order
description: Sin descripción

name: Crimson Snow
description: Story driven horror game with Christmas theme. It has a dialogue system and multiple endings.

name: Half-Life 2: Capture the Flag
description: Half-Life 2 Capture the Flag brings the familiar Capture the Flag game to HL2. It pits the Rebels against the Combine in a fast-paced battle over the flags within the graphics rich environment of the Source engine.

name: Jelly God
description: Jelly God is a colourful, casual, jelly management game. Design your character and play at your own pace in a procedurally generated open world. Grow your jelly tribe by figuring out recipes, spawning new chunks of land, and colouring the environment to unlock new resources.

name: The Girl in the Window
description: The Girl in the Window is the first point and click game the Dark Dome with which the series of a dark town called Hidden Town would begin surrounded by ancient mysteries. In this game you play Dan, a curious guy who has entered an abandoned house and has been locked up. You will have to solve riddles and puzzles, open drawers and decipher codes, everything in your power to escape the room.

name: Meet'N'Fuck Office Romance
description: Name of our today's hero is Philllip. He works as an analyst in the large company. All his job is just a boring routine. Everyday sitting at work he dreams about crazy sexual adventure.

name: Meet'N'Fuck: The Plumber
description: There is a classic porn story. Steven works as plumber in Springfield. You think it's dirty job? Yeah! But he loves it. Every day he has a chance to meet with another sexy housewife.

name: Meet'N'Fuck: BDSM Club
description: Recently I met a very sexy girl. Her name was Rachel. She was telling a lot of stories from her weird sexual life. At the first time, I didn't believe her of course. But on my birthday, she gave me a flyer to BDSM club of Madam Vinson.

name: Meet'N'Fuck Denise Milani
description: You'll play for a superhero, because today you're fated to save that awesome beauty. Then may be, she'll make an exception for you and you'll get unforgettable night with Denise Milani.

name: Meet'N'Fuck: Ocean Cruise
description: Nick Sanders is a beginner photographer from Springfield. Today he's got a really hot job. Erotic magazine Playdude is going to send him to the ocean cruise.

name: Meet'N'Fuck Kingdom
description: We're going to the Middle Ages. There we meet our hero Murton. In Lavindor Kingdom he's known as the best healer. Today he's got a mission of great importance! Man's power of the King has gone out unexpectly in recent days. And you should make a special love potion which can bring back his potency. As a reward you'll get as much gold as you can carry.

name: Tetsudou Nippon! Rosen Tabi: Kikansha Thomas-hen - Ooigawa Tetsudou wo Hashirou!
description:
A train simulation game from Sonic Powered's "Japanese Rail Sim" series.

This game was localized and released in the west by the title "Japanese Rail Sim 3D: Travel of Steam", but, unique to its original Japanese release, is the inclusion of elements from the TV show " Thomas the Tank Engine", which Oigawa Railway was collaborating with. As expected, by choosing to play on this mode, you can drive as Thomas, the main character of the show.

In this entry, the focus is turned around steam locomotives. You can drive the C11 No. 190 steam locomotive, the first one in this series, through a 39.5 km trip from Kanaya Station to Senzu Station on Oigawa Railway's Oigawa Main Line.

name: G-Mode Archives 43: Izumi Jiken File Vol. 3 - Yujuku-hen
description:
Novelist Kagamizuki Masamune was suspected of a murder case while traveling... The third installment of the full-scale mystery adventure series.

The mystery adventure "Izumi Jiken File" series is a mystery adventure game that "deduces the culprit" based on the situation at the crime scene and the information collected by interviewing.

The best-selling author "Kagamizuki Masamune" who always goes on a sudden trip, and the new editor "Izumi Kido" who is in charge of it. Three days before the deadline for the new manuscript, Izumi, who is heading to Kagamizuki's apartment, receives an email.
"It's become a big deal. I want you to help me. Please come to Kirishimayama Ryokan in Kagoshima as soon as possible."
A hot spring inn wrapped in the fresh greenery of Mt. Kirishima. There was a figure of Kagamizuki who was suspected of murder...

In the open-air bath where there was a murder case, there are employees at the entrance and "Yoshizu" around it, so it is impossible to commit the crime from the outside.

It seems that the five men who used the open-air bath were forced to wait at the inn as suspects of the incident.
At this rate, my name as a novelist will be scratched. In order to clear Kagamizuki's suspicion, Izumi challenges to solve the case.

name: Love Root Zero Kiss Kiss Labyrinth
description: PS2 otome game inspired by a Manga Walker series.

name: Lunch Box
description: A peaceful animal kingdom, everyone was attacked by ferocious animals that suddenly appeared while having a good day. Survive the purple animals as if they were infected. Either carry a gun to survive, or they'll be lunch boxes.

name: Horror Night: Spooky Night Vol. 1
description: Enjoy the spooky season by wearing this amazing costumes and masks while playing Horor Night :)

name: Omni Magic!
description: The Kingdom of Elaire was protected by Goddess. When the treasure was stolen, the King called for investigators, whose mission was to research monsters and bring the treasure back. The newly appointed magician Anemone goes on the adventure, using the item-based magic, "Omni Magic"...

name: Our Fantasy Quest
description:
The adventure begins in a fantasy world!
Play your way through a variety of quests!

name: Densha Unten Shirei! Tokyo-wan-hen
description: Densha Unten Shirei! Tokaido-hen (the title translates to Train Operation Command! Tokyo Bay Edition) is a download-only train driving game released for the 3DS, set on a fictionalised version of the railway line from Tokyo to Kamogawa.

name: Densha Unten Shirei! Tokaido-hen
description: Densha Unten Shirei! Tokaido-hen (the title translates to Train Operation Command! Tokaido Edition) is a download-only train driving game released for the 3DS, set on a fictionalised version of the railway line from Tokyo to Atami.

name: Suika Game
description: A game where you drop fruits. When two of the same fruit meet, they form a bigger fruit, which can then combine to create an even bigger fruit, until eventually you form a watermelon!

name: No Man's Sky: Desolation
description: Scavenge and survive in the haunted wreckage of derelict freighters with the Desolation update. Introducing procedurally-generated freighters, more story content, combat improvements, freighter customisation and more!

name: Utakata no R: Kako-hen Awayuki
description: "Utakata no R: Kakohen Awayuki" is a role-playing game created by "R Man 44", released in 2021.

name: Memento
description:
The scene of the accident kept rolling in my head again and again, and I fell crying on the floor, just now understanding what happened. The sadness and the guilt started crawling straight inside my heart. My body was shaking and I couldn’t stop crying.
I lost the family that I just got back, we just started forming a real family again, and I ruined everything. All the time I spent in the office, working, and not spending time with my family was now my biggest regret.

name: Linia Stripes
description: Linia Stripes is the new compelling “clear the board” game. Sit down, relax and collect patterns while you discover thousands of mesmerizing colorful levels!

name: Arab Drift Cars
description: Start playing the Arab style, specifically Saudi Arabia, in the open world. You can explore, drift, race and much more

name: Link Bomb Party
description: Come and join this refreshing blasting party~

name: The Backrooms
description: The Backrooms is a first person survival horror game set in one of the most terrifying environments of the human psyche. Explore an ever evolving nightmare while running from terrifying creatures to stay alive.

name: Fluff
description: A game where you collect fluff balls that are loose and fill them into jars, all while being accompanied by a feline companion.

name: The Thing at the Window
description:
You live with your father in the rural American midwest. He left you home alone while he's out of town for the weekend, and you heard on the radio that there's a large storm heading your way.

You live in a rather underdeveloped part of the country so you're off the power grid, but fortunately your dad's pretty handy and he's wired up your old farmhouse to a gas generator, which you moved to the basement to keep it out of the storm. The basement smells kind of funny and it's really hazy down there, but it should be okay for now. There's a big fuel tank outside where you can refill your jerry can, and dad refilled it before he left. There's also a big pile of wooden boards out front from when your dad renovated the barn over the summer, so you can use those to board up the windows just in case.

The storm should be here soon and you're as prepared as you can be, but still you feel uneasy; something's not quite right... you feel as if something's lurking out there, watching.

Your goal is to survive three nights of the Thing trying to force its way into your home, by barricading doors and windows. The thing really doesn't like light, so you can drive it away with your rechargeable flashlight. You can also "reinforce" parts of the house by turning lights on, which will slow the thing's attacks at the cost of draining more power and needing to refill the generator more frequently.

name: Machine Gun Mages
description: Battle through hell using your powerful magic and trusty sidearm to fight off endless demons. Pick your hero's class, grow your magical ability, customize your gear and upgrade your guns to create an incredibly replayable game experience that is new each time.

name: Portal War
description: "Portal War" is a classic 2D "Tug of War" strategy game. You need to plan and send correct uncontrollable troops towards the enemies and hope they beat them.

name: Strategy Battles​
description: Strategy Battles is a real time strategy game.it has many fields such as diplomacy, military and science.but the economy has a weighted mechanics..build cars, chemical factories..you can sell or import your products.you can use many more methods for the welfare of the people.

name: Lost Hammer
description: Lost Hammer - This is a 3D adventure with puzzle elements and first person view. You have to take on the role of a city dweller who dreams of becoming a blacksmith's apprentice.

name: Mission In Space
description: 2d space shooter game where need avoid and destroy enemies and big boss

name: Lost in the Backrooms
description: Explore and survive levels based on the popular creepypasta lore. Each level features different ways to escape with dangers along the way. Explore the seemingly infinite expanse of eerily familiar levels in the backrooms for a taste of the game's creepy maze-like twists and turns.

name: Sliiide!
description: Pair cuddly jello blocks into groups to melt your way onward across a zen and atmospheric landscape. Though deceptively simple, this game will make use of your wit, test your abstract thought and encourage you to think multiple moves in advance. Collect all the stars to solve the puzzle perfectly!

name: The Most Awesome Game Ever Made
description: Do you really want to live your life knowing that you never played 'The Most Awesome Game Ever Made?'... I didn't think so! Wishlist it right now so you don't miss out on the fun!

name: BlackberryNova: Sports Club
description: To get closer to Izumi, Kotori decides to join a sports club with her.

name: E.E.R.I.E2
description: E.E.R.I.E 2 is a tactical shooting game. In the modern Gensokyo, play the role of fairy Luna, and uses a variety of modern light weapons and tactical equipment to join in a war that decides the fate of Gensokyo.

name: Who is Here?
description: Who Is Here is a single player indie horror game. You have to get out of the apartment, where something strange is happening.

name: Bonerdale
description: Stroll around the beautiful suburban town of Bonerdale. Meet its lovable and sexy residents while you and your friends are trying to find a job and uncover the mystery of the murders that are taking place in the town.

name: Yugekitai: Saikyoushin Fukkatsu no Maki
description: The members of the punk rock band "Yugekitai" find out about a plot to resurrect a god of destruction Susanoo. Hilarity ensues.

name: Lisa: The Painful - Fractured Bonds
description: Lisa: The Painful - Fractured Bonds is a mod for LISA: The Painful that revolves around Brad's childhood friends Rick, Sticky, and Cheeks. The mod includes lots of new enemies to fight and new story cutscenes.

name: Annventure
description: Annventure is a RPG Maker horror game inspired by Earthbound.

name: Basketball: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade - Challenge Mode Edition
description:
A game in the "Breakthrough Gaming Arcade" series!

This game's release is part of Breakthrough Gaming's "Bible Video Game Sundays"!
Purchase and play our new Christian themed video games releasing every Sunday morning in the PlayStation Store today!

name: The Brains & The Brawn
description: The Brains & The Brawn is a RPG Maker game inspired by LISA: The Painful.

name: Annventure of a Lifetime
description: This is the second game in the Annventure trilogy of horror RPGs created by Yoobi

name: Tales of Howl Town
description:
Stop the werewolves and solve the mystery of Howl Town.

Tales of Howl Town is a single-player mystery-themed puzzle game playable on Amazon.com. As Amazon delivery driver Zara Briggs, you must identify and banish four werewolves disguised as town villagers. But be warned: banishing the wrong villagers may have disastrous consequences!

Tales of Howl Town is available to US players from 10/27/2022 to 10/31/2022.

name: An Annventure to End Them All
description: The final game in the Annventure trilogy of Earthbound inspired horror RPGs

name: This Way Madness Lies
description:
Let us begin our tale, in the quiet city of Verona, Italy. A town for lovers... and giant, mutant flower attacks.

As the leader of the Stratford-Upon-Avon High Drama Society, Imogen is no ordinary girl! Sure, she goes to school every day and helps produce plays for the community, but beyond that, she's a magical girl! With her powers, she can teleport to alternate dimensions based on Shakespeare plays, fight back the forces of Nightmare, and still get back in time for dinner!

Join Imogen, Paulina, Viola, Rosalind, Miranda, Beatrice, and Kate on an epic adventure throughout the Shakespearean metaverse in this comedy JRPG!

name: Atelier Ryza: Ever Darkness & the Secret Hideout - Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
(Content of "Atelier Ryza: Digital Deluxe Edition")
- The game "Atelier Ryza: Ever Darkness & the Secret Hideout"
- Costume Set "Another Fashion"
- Costume Set "Summer Style"
- Hideout Parts "Pixie Forest"
- Hideout Parts "Lakeside Hideout"
- Initial Dash Item Set
- Extra Large! Rebuild Gem Pack

The concept of this title, the latest in the series to depict a new "Atelier" world, is "True-to-life youths that develop together, even if just a little bit".
It is the story of a girl and her friends who are about to become adults, discovering what is most important to them.
To depict the story of the main characters discovering things they've never seen before, we've created fields with natural shadows that allow you to feel the breath of the world. Graphics have been further enhanced, allowing for a world of daily-life and adventure to be depicted in a new way.

name: Wargroove: Double Trouble Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: QuietMansion2
description: Sin descripción

name: G-Mode Archives 04: Beach Volleyball Girl Shizuku
description: This two-on-two beach volleyball game has players competing to be the best team possible.The core game is action-based, with a relatively fast pace and special over-the-top super moves for each character. Players can either play in a story mode, where they follow protagonist Shizuku's beach volleyball career, or practice matches against the CPU in a versus mode. A collection mode also lets players dress up the characters in the various swimsuits they've collected.

name: Fairy Tail: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Magic × Guilds × RPG! Based on the fantasy adventure comic about Natsu, a Dragon Slayer of the rowdy Fairy Tail magician guild and his unique group of friends battling against no less unique and memorable enemies.

From popular fan-favorite episodes to original in-game episodes, players can experience the magical world of Earth Land and fight with Fairy Tail in the exhilarating story!

Fairy Tail's Digital Deluxe Edition comes with:
- Costume set: Grand Magic Games team costumes
- Bonus Lacrima set
- DDX limited costume: Ryza costume for Lucy

name: Sakura Taisen Online: Paris no Yuuga na Hibi
description:
A mini-game collection in the Sakura Taisen series that is playable online. Also included a series of tabletop games packed in.

The game was released in two versions, Teito no Nagai Hibi and Paris no Yuugana Hibi.

name: Pierre's Adventures in French
description: Want to improve your French? Need a break from flash cards and listening exercises? Ready to put what you've already learned into practice? Félicitations! This is the game for you.

name: Super Bub Contest
description:
Super Bub is a Net Yaroze game created by Alex Herbert that was featured on the Euro Demo 43, French Euro Demo 29 and the Euro Demo 04/99 demo discs that were distributed with the official PlayStation Official Magazine.

It is a Puzzle Bobble-like game where colored bubbles are shot towards the ceiling. If you then shoot fireballs in a matching color at them they will break.

name: Dead Days
description:
Four strangers died that day. Now they live again, forced to hunt down specters just to keep their new bodies charged with the energy now fueling their second chance at life. Any joy they may have had at living again is soon stifled by the dispassionate employer that treats them as disposable combatants with no concern for the unnatural libido and arousal caused by their new bodies' reaction to stressors.
Can these ordinary people estranged from violence cope with the murder they must now inflict to survive and endure the flames of lust now burning within? Will they ever truly return to their normal lives, or will their return remain a superficial farce?

name: Mastaba Snoopy
description: An Unknown Alien Being acquires a child's forgotten book and mistakenly believes that it depicts proper protocol for interaction with the human world.

name: Half-Life: Abeyance
description: Abeyance is the final entry into the trilogy of mods featuring the protagonist Jane Doe, the first two being HTC and Autonomy Lost. You play as Jane Doe, a HECU grunt, while hunting for the assassin who left you and your buddies for the Grim Reaper.

name: Half-Life: Uplinked
description: Uplinked is a series of eleven maps that aims to be an extension to “Forget About Freeman!”. You now have to tune the transmitter to gain access to the Lambda Complex. It contains several new puzzles along the way.

name: Half-Life: Science and Industry
description: Science and Industry is a teamplay mod for Half-Life, in which players assume the role of Security Officer in one of two rival corporations striving for domination in the cutthroat world of chemical and weapons research and development.

name: Half-Life Randomizer
description: This mod randomizes almost everything in Half-Life to give it a new, fresh way to play. You could get a hornet gun instead of the crowbar. A headcrab could be an assassin. Anything is possible, and no matter how many times you've played Half-Life, you'll never see what's coming.

name: Soda Hunt
description: Party sucks, all you want is to leave and drink a refreshing Soda. But everyone's up to stop you.

name: Half-Life: Hour-Glass
description:
After turning down the G-Man's offer, you manage to escape using an intergalactic teleporter that returns you back to Earth. But soon, that calm peacful feeling of returning back to normal is replaced with fear as you realize that your wife has disappeared along with several people from your apartment that have seemingly
disappeared.

name: Half-Life: Crowbar-Deep in the Dead
description: Half-Life: Crowbar-Deep in the Dead is a complete re-imagining of the first episode of DOOM (1993), taking all of the original levels from Knee-Deep in the Dead and remaking them in the style of Half-Life and its many expansions.

name: War: The Savior's Order
description: Step into the shoes of Tony Snyder - a former Navy Seals operative who just joined TSO, a top secret worldwide military organization. A new terrorist threat has been discovered, and they are planning something big. Uncover their secrets and plans as you fight against them and save the day.

name: Half-Life: Loop
description: Codename: Loop is a twin-stick shooter game based on Half-Life.

name: GameKey: Disney Princess - Rescue Race / Memory Chase
description: Rescue Race / Memory Chase is a GameKey cartridge designed to be used with Disney Princess Jakks Pacific Plug & Play with GameKey compatibility. It contains two games based on Disney's Snow White and the Seven Dwarves.

name: GameKey: Disney - Disney Sports Tennis / Disney Face Chase
description:
An expansion the Jakks Pacific Disney Plug & Play. It contains two games:

- Disney Sports Tennis
A basic Disney-themed tennis game

- Disney Face Chase
A puzzle game, where the player matches pictures of famous Disney characters, such as Mickey Mouse.

name: GameKey: Spider-Man - Black Cat / Doc Ock
description: An expansion for Jakks Pacific plug-and-play Marvel line with GameKey compatibility. It contains Spider-Man games.

name: Half-Life: Recovery
description: Half-Life: Recovery is a Modification which continues the plot of the official add-on Decay after the events of the original add-on. The main character - Colette Green (partner of Gina Cross), looking for a way to leave Black Mesa along with Dr.Keller. A portable teleportation device will help them to do it. Taking possession of it is considered as a matter of life and death.

name: Half-Life: Hard Duty
description: Welcome to Hard Duty. This is a Half-Life modification with the objective of expanding the Half-Life universe with new content. Explore the Black Mesa Research Facility like never before and fight your way through hordes of enemies! How will you engage the situation? How will you survive?

name: Half-Life: Soldier
description: Find a way to enter into the enemy base, and destroy it. This is your only chance soldier.

name: Half-Life: Timeline 1
description: You are Gordon Freeman, formerly a scientist at Black Mesa Research Establishment, now reluctantly employed by a mysterious organisation as a troubleshooter. You are contacted by the Man in Blue. He seems strangely worried; something has ruffled his normally impenetrable character.

name: Half-Life: Rally
description: Half-Life Rally is a racing modification for the highly acclaimed and everlastingly popular game, Half-Life by Valve Software. Unlike most mods currently being made for the Half-Life Engine, the goal of HL-Rally is not to blast your enemy to smitherines with relentless repetition prone to excessive cheating and hacks, but to race cars and be the first and fastest across the finish line, out-running your opponents in any way possible to gain a few milliseconds on them.

name: GameKey: Disney - Disney Sports Bowling / Goofy's Underwater Adventure
description: An expansion the Jakks Pacific Disney Plug & Play. It contains two games.

name: GameKey: Disney - Disney Sports Tennis / Disney Face Chase / The Riches of Agrabah with Disney
description: An expansion for the Disney plug & play by Jakks Pacific.

name: Half-Life: Xen-Warrior
description: Sin descripción

name: GameKey: Namco - Dig Dug / New Rally X
description:
An expansion (GameKey) for Namco Jakks Pacific plug & play consoles. It works with consoles with the compatibility code "NM".

Included games:

- Dig Dug
- New Rally-X

name: GameKey: Namco - Pac-Man / Bosconian / Rally-X
description:
An expansion (GameKey) for Namco Jakks Pacific plug & play consoles. It works with consoles with the compatibility code "NM".

Included games:

- Pac-Man
- Bosconian
- Rally-X

name: GameKey: Star Wars - Yoda's Escape / Turret Defense
description: An expansion (GameKey) for the Star Wars Jakks Pacific plug & play consoles. It works with the consoles with "SW" compatibility.

name: GameKey: Dora the Explorer - Soccer / Dora's Star Mountain Adventure
description: An expansion (GameKey) for Nickelodeon Jakks Pacific plug & play consoles with the compatibility code "NK".

name: GameKey: Nick SpongeBob SquarePants - Sponge Pop / Snowball Showdown
description: An expansion (GameKey) for Nickelodeon Jakks Pacific plug & play consoles with the compatibility code "NK".

name: GameKey: Nicktoons - Nicktoons Volleyball / Birdie Putt
description: An expansion (GameKey) for Nickelodeon Jakks Pacific plug & play consoles with the compatibility code "NK".

name: GameKey: Namco - Pac-Man / Bosconian
description: An expansion (GameKey) for plug & play consoles with "NM" compatibility.

name: Zombie Attack Girls
description:
It's just another normal day at high school… until you stop by the nurse's office and find one of your classmates hunched over another, covered in blood, and the sounds of slurping fill your ears. It doesn't take long to piece two and two together—there's a zombie virus spreading!

While everyone is desperate to escape, your survival-loving classmate is fired up and ready for action! The two of you team up with two other girls—a childhood friend and a timid loner who seems to have a dark side. Can you dodge the zombies without getting distracted by the advances of your cute teammates?

name: Blackout
description: Blackout is a Danish psychological horror adventure game, created and produced by Michael Valeur and Deadline Games and released in 1997. The game uses stop-motion FMV sequences with puppets to deliver a story about an amnesiac protagonist in the backstreets of Copenhagen, Denmark. Walking the streets of Copenhagen, the protagonist runs into many shady characters, some of whom seem to have additional information on who the character is. The game features a mystery based on multiple personalities being uncovered by a psychologist, assassinations, prostitution, and the production of snuff porn. The game came with a companion novel, written by Michael Valeur.

name: Project: Quantum Leap
description: A Half-Life single player episode with a bit of a twist: each map is by a different mapper - 20 maps, 15 authors, one hell of an incoherent map pack!

name: Detective Clean
description: What follows is a tale of neither predetermined tragedy or comedy. You are Detective Clean, the most respected and feared crime fighter in Mupuqolis.

name: Afternoon in the House of Secrets
description: You have come to this enigmatic house in search of the secret that you know is here. You shall not leave until you find it!

name: Fishao
description: Fishao is an online fishing game that features a cute and very colourful theme that is very engaging. Players are presented with a huge open world to explore and plenty of special items such as fishing rods and tackle to collect that are designed to help give them the edge as they work towards the ultimate goal of winning the prestigious fishing tournament.

name: Assassin's Creed II
description:
A remaster of Assassin's Creed II included with Assassin's Creed: The Ezio Collection.

All the single-player add-on content (The Battle of Forlì, Bonfire of the Vanities) is included and multiplayer is removed.

name: Assassin's Creed Brotherhood
description:
A remaster of Assassin's Creed Brotherhood included with Assassin's Creed: The Ezio Collection.

All the single-player add-on content (Copernicus Conspiracy, The Da Vinci Disappearance) is included and multiplayer is removed.

name: Assassin's Creed Revelations
description:
A remaster of Assassin's Creed Revelations included with Assassin's Creed: The Ezio Collection.

All the single-player add-on content (The Lost Archive) is included and multiplayer is removed.

name: Pandora: Kimi no Namae wo, Boku ha Shiru
description: A otome game by Otomate.

name: Eikoku Tantei Mysteria
description: Eikoku Tantei Mysteria is a 2013 otome visual novel video game for the PlayStation Portable created by Karin Entertainment and published by Marvelous in Japan.

name: Soshite Kono Sora ni Kirameku Kimi no Uta
description: Soshite Kono Sora ni Kirameku Kimi no Uta is an adventure otome game, developed and published by Datam Polystar, which was released in Japan in 2006.

name: Soshite Kono Sora ni Kirameku Kimi no Uta XXX
description: A fandisc to Soshite Kono Sora ni Kirameku Kimi no Uta.

name: Trouble Fortune Company Happy Cure
description: A PS2 otome game.

name: Better Call Saul
description: Better Call Saul for the Nintendo DS is a small fan/joke game based on the popular TV-Series of the same name.

name: Danzai no Maria: The Exorcism of Maria La Campanella
description: A port for PSP.

name: D.C. Girl's Symphony Pocket
description: A port for PSP.

name: SpongeBob's Atlantis Squarepantis
description:
SpongeBob's Atlantis SquarePantis is a 2007 video game based on the Nickelodeon animated television series SpongeBob SquarePants, specifically the Atlantis SquarePantis TV movie. The Wii and PlayStation 2 versions were developed by Blitz Games. The Game Boy Advance and Nintendo DS versions were developed by Altron.
This is a single and multiplayer action-adventure game. The different characters, being Spongebob, Patrick, Squidward, Mr Krabs, Sandy, and Plankton, all have different abilities that are related to their character in some way. In the handheld versions, the characters are controlled in pairs and can perform combo abilities.

name: Personal Space
description: An anti-social roguelike for the ages. Humans may be social creatures, but you sure as heck aren't! Use a variety of items and abilities to ensure your "survival" against hoards extroverted people. Be persistent, and keep your distance. No violence required.

name: Lantern Lagoon
description: Sin descripción

name: Leisure Suit Larry: Love for Sail
description: Mobile phone game for J2ME. Despite sharing its name with Leisure Suit Larry: Love for Sail!, it is a completely different game with an original plot. The game stars the original Larry Laffer.

name: Lisa: The Purposeful
description: This Lisa fan game tells the story of Richard Weeks from the original game and what happened to him after Brad and Sticky left him.

name: Action Half-Life
description: Action Half-Life is a multiplayer game that aims to simulate to experience of being in an action movie like Hard Boiled, Face Off, and Die Hard.

name: Liza: The Ungrateful
description: LIZA: The Ungrateful is a story about a woman who neglects the safety of her baby during pregnancy and seeks to find the one who caused the flash.

name: Action Quake 2
description: Action Quake 2 was originally developed in 1998 to recreate the look and feel of an action movie, having a fast pace and a semi-realistic damage system. It features many maps recreating realistic settings, such as city streets and office buildings, with a balanced range of weapons and equipment inspired by action films. Polished and prepared for modern re-release, we're inviting everyone to revisit what we call Aqtion!

name: Pokémon Legends: Arceus - Daybreak
description: In the Daybreak update, you will begin investigating mysterious mass outbreaks of Pokémon that are popping up all over the Hisui region. You’ll also have a chance to battle powerful opponents, like Legendary Pokémon and wardens, adding yet more options to your Pokémon battle experience.​

name: Crypto-Shots
description: Crypto-Shots is a browser-based First Person Shooter Play to Earn game native to The WAX blockchain. The project has begun on the 19th of October'21 and has been ever developing since. In Crypto-Shots you can collect weapon parts, blend them into cool NFTs and use them to take down enemies across different planets. Or, if you like adrenaline, even challenge your friends in the arenas.

name: Haste
description: Haste is an eighteen-map Doom II megawad for Boom-compatible source ports by various mappers known for their work in the slaughter map genre. The project was originally headed by Scotty but seen to completion by Insane_Gazebo. Initially, the maps were meant to be short and more accessible challenge maps that could be beaten by lower-skilled players on the Ultra-Violence difficulty setting, but the style shifted to longer and more challenging maps after Insane_Gazebo took over the project. The WAD was released on the Doomworld forums on September 22nd, 2021 and was awarded a Cacoward at the end of that year.

name: Cryogenics
description:
Cryogenics is a four-level PWAD for boom-compatible source ports designed by bemused and released in December, 2017. All four levels are designed around the slaughter map trope; extremely detailed geometry, massive architecture and high density of enemies are landmarks of the mapset. Cryogenics is designed for pistol start. It includes new textures and music.

Cryogenics was named as a runner-up during the Cacowards 2018.

name: Micro Slaughter Community Project
description:
Micro Slaughter Community Project (MSCP for short) is an eighteen-map Doom II megawad for Boom-compatible source ports. The project was led by Bauul and was aimed at creating a set of short and accessible slaughter maps with a par time of five minutes. The WAD uses textures from the OTEX texture set.

It was released on the Doomworld forums on January 28, 2021, and was uploaded to the idgames archive on April 23, 2021. The mapset received an honorable mention at the 2021 Cacowards.

name: Ar Luminae
description: Ar Luminae is a single-level PK3 for Doom II and the GZDoom source port that was released in November 2020. It was designed by Aurelius and Kaito and uses several music tracks: "Wolverine" and "Atomic" by James Paddock (Jimmy), "Fission Dance" by Brayden Hart (AD_79), and a MIDI rendition of "Gerudo Valley" from The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time. It received one of the 2020 Cacowards. The map integrates the gameplay changes of the Supercharge mod.

name: Black Snow
description: Welcome to Amaluuk research station, we hope your stay is a productive and pleasant one.

name: NoReason's Speedmaps 2
description: NoReason's Speedmaps 2 is a collection of new speed running maps.

name: Solitaire: The Clean One
description: A solitaire game with minimalist design aesthetic. Can be played in 1-card or 3-card draw format, as well as a variety of different scoring systems.

name: The Glitched Attraction
description: Welcome to the new Fazbear Horror Attraction! Here, you will have to escape from the popular and safe animatronics of the old but improved Fazbear Entertainment! Complete the puzzles and get out of the rooms before time runs out!

name: Fallen London: The Exile's Chalice
description: "The Exile's Chalice" is add-on for Fallen London, a browser-based choose-your-own-adventure game set in "Fallen London", an alternative Victorian London with gothic overtones. "The Exile's Chalice" was originally the Exceptional Story for October, 2022.

name: Half-Life: Visitors
description:
You play the young lawyer Dr. Alan Green, who was sent to the desert as a safety evaluator to carry out a safety report of Black Mesa.

After a brief walk towards your temporary office you suddenly find yourself in a situation you are not prepared for. Can you use what you have around you to escape this nightmare?

name: Half-Life: Prison
description:
Prison Takes place on a Large Underground Prison Facility, Located on Siberia. In a Distress, Under This System is a Prison Dungeons Alien Hive and Once the Aliens come From Xena.

Gordon Freeman travels to the Destroyed Prison Overuned by Aliens and Travels to the Prison Dungeons Alien Hive, Where he Faces A Large Population of Aliens and Attempt to stop an Unknown Being that is Creating a Chaos.

name: Half-Life: Escape
description: Sin descripción

name: Half-Life: Cleaner's Adventures
description: You play as Bryan Anderson, a Black Mesa janitor who is unfortunate enough to get caught up in the Resonance Cascade and must now combat the vicious Xen forces and the hostile HECU.

name: Half-Life: In Deep
description: This mod reinterprets Half-Life as closer to what the beta version was.

name: Plants vs. Zombies 2: Reflourished
description:
Introducing PvZ 2: Reflourished, a PvZ 2 mod that aims to bring back the classic pre-2017 feel to PvZ 2, while adding a bunch of new content as well!

From humble beginnings, this mod started as a remake of the classic Holiday Mashup experience, but kept growing, and growing, until we had a whole new game on our hands! With a whole team of modders, designers, and artists, we bring you: PvZ 2: Reflourished!

name: Fhtagn Simulator
description:
Fhtagn Simulator is a Roguelike card game inspired by deck-building games such as Luck be a Landlord, Slay the Spire, and Monster Train. If you don't collect enough spirit within the time limit, you will face punishment from the ancient gods resulting in game failure.

The world of Cthulhu is chaotic and disorderly, so cards always enter the roulette in a chaotic order, and each round may produce a different result. Except praying, there is one way to fight against Chaos, and that is to manage the card slots on the roulette. With a little change, you can maximize value of your cards.

During the course of the game you will experience various events, as well as obtain various cards, powerful mythical monsters, humble human sacrifices, evil spells and so on. In addition to this, relics rewarded by the evil gods have the ability to change the game. Use them well to get more spirit!

name: Don't Mess With My Papitas
description: Don't Mess With My Papitas is a game about saving (lil)potatoes.

name: Eden's Edge
description: Eden's Edge is a 2.D vertical doujin Shoot 'em Up developed by x.x.

name: Project Sushi
description: A simple platformer with a little sushi's goal to reach the end as fast as possible! Go through the levels, weather your running on a chess table or in space, you'll be sure to have a fun and challenging time with this game.

name: Shadow the Hedgehog: Reloaded
description: Shadow the Hedgehog: Reloaded is a quality of life and enhancement mod for the original Shadow the Hedgehog.

name: Christopher Columbus
description: Christopher Columbus is a cancelled shoot 'em up game for the Super Famicom that was in development in 1992 to 1993. The game was based on the famous Italian explorer Christopher Columbus.

name: Doki: Maternal
description: Doki: Maternal is a Brazilian educational game for PC

name: PaperPlane
description:
PaperPlane is a video game where you fly a paper airplane through typical childhood memories. You give life back to these memories by flying close to them, through them or around them.
Enabling those memories give access to little sketches which put some movement to the landscape. Also, each one of them is can be viewed in a polaroid pictures book inside the tree house.

name: My Star-Crossed Girlfriend
description:
After studying abroad in Italy, you're finally home and eager to meet up with your childhood friend. But while the two of you are talking, someone catches your eye—a beautiful girl from a rival school.

As days pass, you find yourself stuck in the middle of a love triangle! Will you choose your trusty best friend who's always been there for you, or will you go down the path of dangerous star-crossed love?

name: Minecraft: Pretty Scary Update
description: Minecraft: Pretty Scary Update adds several new mobs such as witches, bats, zombie villagers, wither skeletons, wearable and placeable heads, a new boss called The Wither, the command block, the anvil, the beacon, new food such as potatoes, carrots, and pumpkin pies), carrots on sticks for controlling pigs and new decoration items such as item frames, flower pots, and cobblestone walls).

name: Minecraft: Redstone Update
description: Minecraft: Redstone Update adds several new redstone-related blocks, including the comparator, hopper, dropper, daylight sensor, trapped chest, weighted pressure plates, and block of redstone, as well as a new block called block of quartz, a scoreboard system, a new texture pack format, and a lighting engine optimization.

name: Minecraft: Horse Update
description: Minecraft: Horse Update adds many new features such as horses, baby zombies, leads, coal blocks, carpets, resource packs, and a new launcher.

name: Minecraft: The Update that Changed the World
description: Minecraft: The Update that Changed the World adds many new features such as a new terrain generator, many new biomes and biome variations, stained glass, red sand, new tree types, a new spawn system, new fish and a new fishing system with rewards, many new flowers, many more customization options, custom-size Nether portals up to 23×23, command blocks in minecarts, and many new commands.

name: Minecraft: Bountiful Update
description: Minecraft: Bountiful Update adds 36 new blocks, 4 new mobs, a new underwater dungeon content called the ocean monument and other changes.

name: Minecraft 1.9: Combat Update
description: Minecraft 1.9: Combat Update completely overhauls the combat system, among other additions and changes.

name: Diabolik Lovers: Limited V Edition
description: Port of Diabolik Lovers: Haunted Dark Bridal for Playstation Vita.

name: Minecraft: Exploration Update
description: Minecraft: Exploration Update is a major update for Minecraft that adds the Woodland Mansion and its mobs, cursed enchantments, new villager professions, mobs, and items.

name: Diabolik Lovers More, Blood Limited V Edition
description: A port for PS Vita.

name: Minecraft: World of Color Update
description: Minecraft: World of Color Update is a major update for Minecraft, which added new and changed colored blocks to be more vibrant. It also added the Parrot, the recipe book and the knowledge book, new commands, and other additions.

name: Minecraft: Update Aquatic
description: Minecraft: Update Aquatic is a major update to Minecraft that focuses on revamping the oceans in the game, adding many new aquatic mobs, blocks, items, and structures.

name: Half-Life: Black Guard
description:
Dr. Eddy has been up to no good. To be honest, that seems like most scientists at Black Mesa. You are part of the Black Guard, I suppose that’s like Black Shift, but maybe not.

Without warning, things really get crazy and you find yourself in the middle of it. Do what BMRF has paid you to do: Kick some butt!

name: Half-Life: Operation Rift
description: This is the second part of HECU Corporal Timothy Collins story and another sequel to Half-Life: Operation Rosenberg.

name: Half-Life: Brave Brain
description: You play as Thomas Redgrave, a friend of Gordon Freeman, who works in different laboratories of Black Mesa on the same day of the accident. You are taking a refresher training course when things go wrong. Do your best to survive until you meet some other scientists, who tell you exactly what you need to do.

name: Half-Life: The Alpha Unit
description:
You play as Corporal Daniel Fletcher and your mission is to recover data from the Anomalous Materials Laboratory.

Along the way you will encounter all sorts of enemies and eventually rejoin your unit. Can you complete your objective?

name: Half-Life: Dark Future
description: The last part of the Rosenberg trilogy.

name: Shall we date? Eternal Vows: Love Beyond Time
description:
Originally released as Nise no Chigiri in Japan for PSP & PC.
Published by NTT Solmare in English for iOS and Android.

name: Nise no Chigiri Omoide no Saki He
description: Fandisc of Nise no Chigiri.

name: Renai Banchou! Inochi Mijikashi, Koiseyo Otome! Love is Power
description: A PSP otome adventure game.

name: Box Forum
description: Sin descripción

name: Garnet Cradle Portable: Kagi no Himemiko
description: A port for PSP.

name: Mighty Tank
description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Garnet Cradle: Sugary Sparkle
description: Fandisc of Garnet Cradle.

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción
